roleset.name: call upon
roleset.note: INVOKE-V NOTES: No Verbnet entry. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from invoke.01-v)

example.name: pretty simple, really
example.text: Mr. Melloan quotes Peter Teagan and invokes the name of Arthur D. Little Inc. to support his statement.
example.arg: the name of Arthur D. Little Inc.
